root: ^“How strange. I didn’t meet a single monster on my way, and yet these forests are famous for being infested with goblins and slugs.”
^“Apparently, luck is just on my side.”
^“When I find the treasure, I will become richer than the king himself. Just the thought of this fills me with happiness, it feels like my heart is about to burst from excitement.”
^“I’ve never stopped for a rest before. Even now I’m writing this note while walking. I don’t feel tired at all.”
^“It’s like someone is carrying me in their arms.”
